## IRoles.minter property

The minter role allows the wallet to mint new assets. ([NFTs](./sdk.nftmodule.mint.md)<!-- -->, [Tokens](./sdk.currencymodule.mint.md)<!-- -->, [Packs](./sdk.packmodule.create.md)<!-- -->, etc)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
